video_prompt: Character subtly shifts poses, from confident full-body stance to an expressive close-up, highlighting delicate facial changes. Hair sways. Jewelry glints. Lightning bolts flicker across the vibrant blue background.
image_prompt: Generate a vibrant, modern anime-style digital artwork.  Display a female character with baby blue hair (long, high ponytail) and amber eyes in two poses: a full-body view (left, hand on hip) and a close-up portrait (right). She wears a white raglan t-shirt with blue sleeves/collar, "ECCTRICER" text, a chunky silver chain with a large circular pendant, gold earrings, shiny black short shorts, a black wristband, and metallic silver athletic shoes with blue accents and blue socks. The background is solid vibrant blue with sharp white lightning bolts. Dominate with a cohesive blue color scheme.
refined_video_prompt: A character subtly transitions poses, their posture shifting and face subtly altering with delicate expressions. Hair gently sways and flows. Jewelry glints as light catches it. Lightning bolts vividly flicker and move across the dynamic blue background.
